scripts.build-inc: set "REACT_APP_PARAMS=full" && rimraf ./../Content/ReactBuild/* && rimraf ./build && react-scripts build && xcopy build .\..\Content\ReactBuild /s /e /y /i
scripts.buildCreateModal: rimraf ./../Content/CreateIncApp/* && rimraf ./build && cross-env REACT_APP_DLG='true' react-scripts build && xcopy build .\..\Content\CreateIncApp /s /e /y /i
scripts.build-maska: rimraf ./../Content/InjectedTables/* && set "REACT_APP_PARAMS=Maska"&& rimraf ./build && react-scripts build && xcopy build .\..\Content\MASKA /s /e /y /i
scripts.build-ivre: rimraf ./../Content/InjectedTables/* && set "REACT_APP_PARAMS=Ivre"&& rimraf ./build && react-scripts build && xcopy build .\..\Content\IVRE /s /e /y /i
scripts.build-zaika: rimraf ./../Content/InjectedTables/* && set "REACT_APP_PARAMS=ZaikaMessages"&& rimraf ./build && react-scripts build && xcopy build .\..\Content\ZAIKA /s /e /y /i
scripts.build-postmodern: rimraf ./../Content/ReactBuild/* && set "REACT_APP_PARAMS=PostModern"&& rimraf ./build && react-scripts build && xcopy build .\..\Content\ReactBuild /s /e /y /i
